response.overview: In the aftermath of an unspeakable act of terror, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the Boston Marathon bombers before they strike again.
response.tagline: The inside story of the world's greatest manhunt.
response.title: Patriots Day
